Notes:   CD 1: Alls songs recorded for the motion picture "Love Me Tender". Recorded August 24, September 4 and 5, October 1, 1956 at Fox Stage 1, Hollywood
CD 2: Recorded live on stage at the Mississippi-Alabama Fair & Dairy Show, Tupelo, September 26, 1956. Tracks 1-11, Afternoon Show / Tracks 16-24 Evening Show.
 
Thanks to the Original uploader!

Enjoy!

Jeroep
